text: wadhkr -ayha alrswl- 'iidh qalat jamaeat minhum lijamaeat 'ukhraa kanat tez almuetadin fi yawm alsbt, wtnhahm ean mesyt allah fyh: lim taeizun qwmana allah muhlikuhum fi aldunya bmesythm 'iiaah 'aw mueadhibuhum eadhabana shdydana fi alakhr? qal aladhin kanuu ynhawnhm ean mesyt allh: naeizhm wnnhahm linuedhar fyhm, wnwdy farad allah ealayna fi al'amr bialmaeruf walnhy ean almnkr, wrja' 'ana ytqu allh, fykhafwh, wytwbu min mesythm rabihim wtedhdhihm ealaa ma hrram elyhm
